definitions.definition: To admit the knowledge of; to recognize as a fact or truth; to declare one's belief in
examples: to acknowledge the being of a god

definitions.definition: To own or recognize in a particular quality, character or relationship; to admit the claims or authority of; to give recognition to.
To be grateful of (e.g. a benefit or a favour)
To report (the receipt of a message to its sender).
examples: This is to acknowledge your kind invitation to participate in the upcoming debate.

definitions.definition: To own as genuine or valid ; to assent to (a legal instrument) to give it validity; to avow or admit in legal form.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To admit the knowledge of; to recognize as a fact or truth; to declare one's belief in

( transitive ) To own as genuine or valid ; to assent to (a legal instrument) to give it validity; to avow or admit in legal form.
